```{mermaid}
flowchart
  
  
A[Request Type] --> B[Existing Institution] --> M[Request includes email + faculty profile] -- Yes --> G{View Person Institutional Profile - Eligible? } -- No --> J[\Send Email 'To Process Request'/]
```
